title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Hello! I'm a results-driven Full Stack Developer with 3.5+ years of experience building and scaling modern web applications with a strong focus on performance, maintainability, and clean architecture.

My core expertise includes .NET Core, Vue.js, and MongoDB, where I specialize in SPA modernization, clean architecture migrations, and resolving complex production issues using tools like Dynatrace. I actively work within Agile teams and contribute to initiatives such as the TTM model to improve software delivery efficiency.

Currently, I am expanding my skill set in React and micro-frontend architecture to design scalable, future-ready front-end systems. Alongside core development, I explore Generative AI concepts, including Prompt Engineering, to experiment with innovative development workflows and smarter problem-solving approaches.
